info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this service instance
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: A URL that will receive event updates when objects are manipulated.
parameters.name: WebhookUrl

parameters.description: true or false - controls whether this instance fires webhooks when client endpoints connect to Sync
parameters.name: ReachabilityWebhooksEnabled

parameters.description: true or false - determines whether token identities must be granted access to Sync objects via the Permissions API in this Service.
parameters.name: AclEnabled

parameters.description: true or false - Determines whether transient disconnections (i.e. an immediate reconnect succeeds) cause reachability webhooks.
parameters.name: ReachabilityDebouncingEnabled

parameters.description: Determines how long an identity must be offline before reachability webhooks fire.
parameters.name: ReachabilityDebouncingWindow

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this document
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: JSON data to be stored in this document
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this Document in seconds, defaults to no expiration.
parameters.name: Ttl

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Permissions applying to a Sync Document.

parameters.description: Sync Service Instance SID or unique name.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Sync Document SID or unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

delete.description: Delete a specific Sync Document Permission.

parameters.description: Sync Service Instance SID or unique name.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Sync Document SID or unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: Identity of the user to whom the Sync Document Permission applies.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Sync Document SID or unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: Identity of the user to whom the Sync Document Permission applies.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.name: Ttl
